author: erack
msg: fix build breakers unxlngx6.pro gcc 4.6.1 (Debian wheezy amd64)
Builds up to but not including offapi.

author: kbrand
msg: Better safe than sorry: with OpenSSL 1.0, X509_STORE_CTX_get_current_cert()
may not always return a cert.

author: kbrand
msg: Fix the default OCSP responder timeout for client cert
validation - 10 µsec is a tad too aggressive.
